entry.tran: 营私舞弊;玩忽职守;渎职
entry.def: If you accuse someone of malpractice, you are accusing them of breaking the law or the rules of their profession in order to gain some advantage for themselves.

example.ex: There were only one or two serious allegations of malpractice.
example.tran: 只有一两起有关营私舞弊的严重指控。

means.word_mean: 1. professional wrongdoing that results in injury or damage;

sentences.sentence: "the widow sued his surgeon for malpractice"

means.word_mean: 2. a wrongful act that the actor had no right to do; improper professional conduct;
